name: PacGhost
description:
Click here for the HTML5-Version

PacGhost v1.0
A game made by Nekusoul
for the Ludum Dare 33
- You Are The Monster -

Rules:
One round of Pacman.
You control the ghosts.
Catch Pacman before he wins!

Controls:
W,A,S,D -> Control Blue Ghost
I,J,K,L -> Control Pink Ghost

Choose a difficulty to start:
(1) Easy: Slow and Bright
(2) Normal: Slow and Dark
(3) Hard: Fast and Dark
